name: NSLayoutConstraint.Relation
desc: The relation between the first attribute and the modified second attribute in a constraint.

items.name: case lessThanOrEqual
items.desc: The constraint requires the first attribute to be less than or equal to the modified second attribute.

items.name: case equal
items.desc: The constraint requires the first attribute to be exactly equal to the modified second attribute.

items.name: case greaterThanOrEqual
items.desc: The constraint requires the first attribute to be greater than or equal to the modified second attribute.
